sentences.en: CEC is the core component of capillary electrochromatography column.
sentences.cn: CEC的核心部件是毛细管电色谱柱.

sentences.en: Does hypodermic and local blood capillary jam have treat?
sentences.cn: 皮下局部毛细血管堵塞有治 吗 ?

sentences.en: For safety consideration due to ruptured seal, reaction of capillary fluid with process fluid should be carefully examined.
sentences.cn: 由于密封破裂出于安全考虑，宜谨慎测试毛细管充液和工艺介质的反应。

sentences.en: Imbibition is thus displacement due only to capillary forces.
sentences.cn: 于是,吸吮是仅仅依靠毛细力的一种驱替.

sentences.en: In nonshrinking soils, the capillary potential derived mainly from capillary suction.
sentences.cn: 在非收缩的土中, 毛细水势主要用毛细水吸力来推导.

sentences.en: It consists of metallic mercury dropping at a steady rate from a capillary tube.
sentences.cn: 它由金属汞从毛细管中以稳定速度滴下而成.

sentences.en: Method The content of panaxynol was determined by capillary gas chromatograph.
sentences.cn: 方法采用毛细管气相色谱法,以正十七为内标物测定含量.

sentences.en: METHODS GC was used with packed column and capillary column, respectively.
sentences.cn: 方法同一样品采用填充柱与毛细管柱分别测定.

sentences.en: On one side of the sheet, blood-vessel cells mimic a capillary wall; on the other, lung-cancer cells mimic lung epithelial cells.
sentences.cn: 在这张图的上边，血管壁细胞模仿毛细血管，，在另一边，模拟肺癌细胞的肺上皮细胞。

sentences.en: One study published in 2007 on the cosmetic benefit of drinking water suggests that 500 ml of water increases capillary blood flow in the skin.
sentences.cn: 2007年公布的一项饮用水的美容效益研究表明，饮用500毫升的水可加快皮肤下毛细血管内的血液流动。

sentences.en: The design alleviates the problem of keeping the closed - end capillary clean and free of mercury slugs.
sentences.cn: 这种设计缓和了要求保持封闭端毛细管清洁和水银芯畅通的问题.

sentences.en: The gasoline detection system consists of a capillary restriction.
sentences.cn: 汽油检测系统由毛细管节流器组成.

sentences.en: The lowermost capillary fringe is a zone in which the pressure is less than atmospheric.
sentences.cn: 最下面的那个毛细水带中的压力小于大气压.

sentences.en: The purity of dimethyl disulfide was determined by capillary gas chromatography.
sentences.cn: 应用毛细管气相色谱法测定二甲基二硫的纯度.

sentences.en: The same equation holds for capillary depression, shown in Fig. 12 - 22 ( b ).
sentences.cn: 这一公式对图12-22 ( b ) 所表示的下降毛细现象同样成立.

sentences.en: The water can be sucked up near the surface by capillary attraction.
sentences.cn: 水能由于毛细管吸力作用而被吸引到靠近道路表面的地方.

sentences.en: This consists of a capillary connected to a mercury reservoir.
sentences.cn: 这由一根与汞池相连的毛细管所构成.

sentences.en: When air cools at night, dew collects on the lizard’s skin and is pulled to its mouth by capillary action.
sentences.cn: 待晚间空气温度下降，凝结在蜥蜴皮肤上的露珠就可以通过毛细管作用输送到它的口中。

sentences.en: When pulmonary capillary pressure is markedly elevated, pulmonary edema ensues.
sentences.cn: 当肺毛细血管压力明显升高时, 就出现肺水肿.

words.tran_cn: 毛细管作用，毛细管现象

trans.tran_en: the smallest type of  blood vessel (= tube carrying blood )  in the body
